Reviews.Content: Please, refurbish it! I spent one night there in April 2007. Very close to the airport, Tianyi is an old 4 stars hotel declassed to 3 stars. It has a very wide hall and a large restaurant, but everithing is old and very used. It would need to be fully refurbished. Room 420 is like written up above, it only lacks a safety box, but the wallpaper is shabby, the carpet is spoiled and theese things give the room a dreary look.Weird chinese breakfast: it looks like a chinese lunch; you can forget continental or english breakfast there; may be you can find just some jam and some bread. For the breakfast you pay only 20 RMB (about 鈧? and $2.6) but for coffee you pay 15 RMB more!
Reviews.Author: Botman
